```{r workflow-stats, echo=FALSE}
# Compute workflow counts dynamically from included markdown
wf_path <- "workflows/workflows_en.md"
wf_lines <- readLines(wf_path, warn = FALSE, encoding = "UTF-8")

section_indices <- function(title) {
  start <- grep(paste0("^## ", title, "\\s*$"), wf_lines)
  if (length(start) == 0) return(integer(0))
  # Next section or end of file
  next_sections <- grep("^## ", wf_lines)
  next_after <- next_sections[next_sections > start]
  end <- if (length(next_after)) min(next_after) - 1 else length(wf_lines)
  seq.int(start + 1, end)
}

count_items <- function(idx, prefix) {
  if (length(idx) == 0) return(0L)
  sum(grepl(paste0("^- \\*\\*", prefix, "[0-9]{3}\\*\\*:"), wf_lines[idx]))
}

counts <- data.frame(
  Category = c("Design", "Build", "Test", "Learn", "Total"),
  Description = c(
    "Experimental design and planning workflows",
    "DNA assembly and cell preparation workflows",
    "Measurement and analysis workflows",
    "Data analysis and modeling workflows",
    ""
  ),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

design_count <- count_items(section_indices("Design"), "WD")
build_count <- count_items(section_indices("Build"), "WB")
test_count <- count_items(section_indices("Test"), "WT")
learn_count <- count_items(section_indices("Learn"), "WL")

counts$Count <- c(
  design_count,
  build_count,
  test_count,
  learn_count,
  sum(c(design_count, build_count, test_count, learn_count))
)

kable(counts[, c("Category", "Count", "Description")], caption = "Workflow Categories Overview")
```
